'''Lights Out''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[John's Revenge (Ch. 1)]] on the island of [[Twins of Nerechtemeresch]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Kill all guards that carry lanterns. Only have John in your team.</big>
